review_details: What a beautiful relaxing holiday yet again, we can't fault this hotel. Our 1st year here was for 7 nights, last year we stayed for 11 & we've just got home from 14 nights. Our room was immaculate, fresh sheets & towels as always. There is a mixture of ages, young & mature. We hired a car for 3 days to see the island & the Dimitrios & Efthimia fishing cruise is a must. Many thanks to the hard working, friendly staff & owners.
We called here for lunch, the food was amazing, well presented & delicious. The staff were friendly & the place spotless.

This is a family run business & it's food is delicious, they are welcoming & friendly & hard working. We love the gyros, home made fries & courgette balls to name a few. When you walk past & it's always busy, just ask yourself why? Because of the food they serve...We go frequently.

I highly recommend this fishing cruise, it was so good last year we returned & booked it again this year. It's a family run business with all home made foods at lunch, Effi cooks the fish that are caught everything tastes amazing. Beautiful people, beautiful cruise, beautiful food.
